inn1.comm: length delivery outside off stump, shaping away slowly, Sehwag opens the blade and runs it past cover point for a single.
SRT stretches well forward to defend a full-length delivery outside off.
length delivery curving away, pushed to the off side.
drifting to the pads, Tendulkar tries to work it to the on side, misses but will pick up the leg bye
short of length, shaping in towards middle, Sehwag whips it wide of square leg and sets off for a run. Tendulkar hesitates before responding and both get across in time.
peachy punchy back-foot drive through covers. Martin Crowe goes gaga on air. It was short in length and outside off, Sachin went back and across, left-elbow high and punched it through the off side.
our favourite blogger is here to bowl. Fullish and outside off stump, left alone
you got to something to write Ian! Full and outside off stump, Sehwag brings his bat crashing down and square drives it to the point boundary.
ah! beaten this time. He corrected the length, Sehwag went for the off-side slash anyway but couldn't connect
fuller and Sehwag slices it again and this time the ball flies between backward point and covers. The bowler and the captain are disappointed that the it didn't go to hands
length delivery just outside off stump, guided to backward point
this one come back in, catching Sehwag by surprise but he adjusts quickly to wrist it to backward square leg for a run
just outside off stump, tapped to third man
straighter, from short of length, Tendulkar hops, works it to the on side and shouts, "wait .. wait"
good delivery, lands on a length around off stump and shapes away, Tendulkar pushes it to covers
overpitched on the legs and Tendulkar doesn't miss. At least not this time. He leans forward and gets the wrists working to send the ball through midwicket.

loud shout for a catch behind decision. Peter McGlashan cleared his throat real loudly but the ump didn't agree. No bat, though. It cut fin from short of length, found the bat and pad gap, missed the bat and kissed the right elbow. Good decision, that.
another one kicking in from short of length, from just outside off stump, Tendulkar gets on top of the bounce to defend to the off side
slightly short of length, Sehwag goes for the pull but the ball cuts in to cramp him and he ends up jabbing it to the on side
in the corridor and Sehwag lets Peter earn his money.
cutting in towards off and middle, Sehwag stays adjacent as ever, opens the bat face and steers the ball to the off side
length delivery around the off stump, again tilting in, not much but tending towards it and Sehwag steers it to the diving gully fielder. One run.
this one holds its  line outside off from short of length, Tendulkar hops, opens the bat face and runs the ball past backward point and will pick two by the time the third man comes across
closer to the off stump and Tendulkar shoulders arms.

Top-edged!  It was the throat-high bouncer and a surprised Sehwag wnet for the pull, eyes off the ball, head up in the air and gets a top edge. The fielder wasn't fine enough at long-leg and the ball landed just inside the boundary, wide of the outstretched hands and runs away
Another short ball but this time Sehwag was waiting. It didn't climb as high, it was around the mid-riff and Sehwag pulls it over midwicket
And again. Short in length and Sehwag goes for it. He fetched it from the off stump and pulled it over the on side. IT was as if he was expecting that length

Whack! What a ripper of a shot. It was a short of length delivery and outside off stump, Sehwag kept his back foot back and across and carved the ball through the off side. It just flew. Whizz.........
turned to midwicket where a diving stop is made by Ross Taylor who throws at the striker's end but misses. Had he hit, Sehwag was gone.
in the channel outside off stump, Tendulkar covers his off stump and lets it go through to Peter
hops to get on top of the bounce and works it to square leg
fuller, coming in to Tendulkar who tries to tickle it to the on side but is rapped on the pads. Going down leg, though.
full in length, lovely delivery in the zone outside off stump, left alone
comes in towards middle and leg, worked behind square leg for a single
short in length and outside off stump, punched to deep backward point
fullish, around the off stump and Sehwag drives fluently but can't beat short covers. That was sweetly timed.

nagging short of length delivery on the off stump. Since Sehwag stays adjacent to the line, he opened the bat face and guided it to backward point, pushing for a single but Tendulkar says are you mad go back. Well not exactly those words but you get the idea. For the record, he just shouted, NO
flicked to the on side for a single
full pitched delivery on the off stump line, Tendulkar drives straight to mid-off
cuts in from short of length towards the leg and middle,  Tendulkar shuffles across to work it to the onside but is rapped on the thigh
good over this. Another one moving in, defended to the on side .
He goes again. It was slightly short of length, coming in towards the off stump, Sehwag swivelled around to pull it high and over midwicket.
Oh that was hit real hard. Another shortish delivery and Sehwag pulls it to the midwicket boundary. "That's too short again,"  says Stephen Fleming on air.
fuller, on the middle and leg, turned to the on side
Tendulkar goes for the pull but can't connect. He edges it to his pad and the ball rolls to the off side
136 kmph length delivery outside off stump, left alone
Another attempted pull from Tendulkar but is a touch slow on the shot and edges it to his body.
good delivery, shaping in towards middle stump, dabbed to the on side
leans forward to turn a full delivery though the on side
now then .. this is a short-of-length delivery on the off and middle stump line, Sehwag swivels on the back foot and laps it over square leg
hits the deck hard, short of length and on the off stump line, nudged to the leg side
drifting to the pads, turned to long leg for a single
getting too ambitious. Sehwag walks across, tries to swat-pull a full delivery and edges it to the body.
leans forward to defend a length delivery to the off side
pushed towards mid-on for a quick single
fullpitched outside off stump, creamy dreamy square drive but can't beat point.

Full. Wide. And Smashed. Overpitched outside off and Sehwag doesn't move his front foot out, just shifts his body weight forward and that lovely bat swing comes crashing down to smash the ball wide of mid-off
moves to the leg side and drives but straight to covers
And he has reached his fifty with a murderous thumping drive through the offside. He backs away a touch, gives himself more room to crash the length delivery through covers. Imperious.
slips down leg side
leans forward to push the length delivery to cover point
short of length, around the off stump, Tendulkar hops back, gets on top of the bounce nicely and dabs it behind square leg for a single
another whip of the wrist. This time it's Sehwag who takes the full ball from off and middle for a single to deep square leg
short in length and outside off stump, punched away to point
short of  length, around off stump, pushed to the off side
holds its line outside off stump, Tendulkar opens the bat-face to steer it to backward point region
short and outside off stump, carved to deep backward point for a single.
short of length, coming in towards off and middle - that's the line they have bowled to Sachin and have tied him down so far - pushed to the off side
a tad slower but drifts down the leg side
that ball again - short in length and moving in towards off and middle - Tendulkar tries to dab it to the on side but the ball goes down the track
leans forward to push a slower one to the on side.
straightens after landing on a length around the off stump, punched to covers
short of length again but a bit of width on offer and Tendulkar cuts and cuts well.
climbs towards rib-cage, Sehwag laps it around the corner for a single
fuller, on the middle and leg, Tendulkar wrists it to long leg

shout for a catch behind decision and it's been given. Sehwag shakes his head as he walks off. Not happy at all. It cut in towards the middle stump from short of length, Sehwag was on the hop, trying to work the ball to the on side and the ball clipped the flap of the pad. Did it hit the bat as well? Sehwag doesn't think so. Anyway that's that. Gautam has walked in.HOT spot says there was no bat involved in that.
gets off the mark with a dab to thirdman
gets off strike with a push to the off side
angling across Gautam who lets Peter collect that.
Tendulkar shuffles to the off stump, taps the ball gently to the off side and takes a quick single

shapes to off drive and edges it to his body. The ball rolls to the off side and Tendulkar calls him over for a quick single. Oram rushes after the ball, turns around and fires in a throw at the non-striker's end. Overthrows!
pushes it wide outside off stump and the umpire Rudi extends his arms
walks down the track, Oram keeps it on the middle, dabbed to the off side
short in length just outside off stump, nudged to backward point
leans forward to defend to the off side
good over this. Nagging middle and off line continues, Gambhir dabs it to point
shuffles across but the ball cuts in from just outside off to cramp him and he just manages to dab it to the off side

Dropped at mid-on. In an effort to push the run rate, Tendulkar walked down the track and tried to knife it over the in-field but it flew just above head high and Mills stretched his hand out but couldn't hold on. Poor Butler; he created the chance but it has been clanged. Mills jumped, got his right hand out but ended up palming it off

What a response. Remember that six against Caddick in the World Cup? Something like that. He seemed to be expecting a short ball and got into the position quickly. Lovely pull and the white balls soars over midwicket.
Even better. Delicious off drive. He eased forward and seemed to just push the ball on the up.  But it kept running away. Superb piece of timing.
slightly short in length, shapes for the cut and edges it to third man
on the off stump line, defended to the off side
outside off stump and Tendulkar runs it down to thirdman
short of length, cut to backward point
drifts to the pads, flicked away to the boundary. Wrong line and Gambhir makes him pay.
leans forward to punch through the off side
short in length, on the off stump line, pushed to cover point
short of length outside off stump, punched to deep point
overpitched outside off and Gambhir pings the sweeper cover with a sweetly-timed drive
short in elngth and outside off, Tendulkar stood up tall to flat-bat it to sweeper cover.
Tendulkar keeps on with the attack. He backs away to the leg side to clout the ball over covers and to the boundary
he was trying to paddle sweep but saw Oram had slipped in a yorker, changed his mind and dug out the ball in a hurry.
SRT is having a ball. The left foot was cleared and he heaved the full length delivery over wide mid-on. Sehwag has gone and Tendulkar has stepped up.
full and around off stump line, squeezed to short third man..
Tendulkar reaches his fifty. He moved outside leg and drove the full delivery between the bowler and mid-off. India keep attacking.
retains the strike with a drive to long-on
hands the strike to Gautam with a dab to third man
angling away from the left-handed Gambhir who runs it down to third man
on the middle and leg, worked to left of long leg and Tendulkar pushes hard to come back for the second run. This is called Gaaji in some parts of India.

nice shot but not no nice fumble in the deep. It kicked up from short of length and Tendulkar wristed the cut shot and the ball rolled to deep backward point where McCullum over ran the ball, stopped and lunged to his right but couldn't stop it.
pushed to the off side and ran straight down the pitch! The comms find it funny that the umpire has missed it
And Gambhir does the same. Dashes down the centre of the pitch. The tv comms are laughing away.
tires to lat cut the delivery but can't connect
leans forward to push it through the on side for a single
leans forward to drive to long-off for another single
comes forward to tickle to square leg
Gambhir chips down the track and plays a lovely pick-up shot, placed perfectly wide of deep midwicket.
waits for the ball to come to him before wristing it through the on side
comes down the track, tries to go for the big heave but mistimes it to mid-on
short in length, angling away, dabbed to third man
leans well forward to drive sweetly but can't beat mid-off
fullish, moving in, turned to the on side
floated outside off stump, pushed through cover point
on the off and middle stump, defended to covers

Danny boy has struck. It landed full on a length, on the middle and Tendulkar went for the sweep but missed it completely. The ball was heading towards middle. Easy decision for Rudy. Vettori is such a good nagging bowler. He rarely gives you anything short,  it's mostly full. And he has got his man.
leans forward to defend a flighted delivery around the off stump line
comes down the track, Vettori keeps it full and Yuvraj whips it back to the bowler who makes a half-stop
goes back to a length delivery that holds its line outside off, pushed back down the track
slanted across Gambhir who dabs it through vacant slip region well to the left of third man
And Gambhir walks down the track for a big ugly heave across the line and edges it to short fine-leg
And NZ have taken out Yuvraj as well.  Moving in that slip has worked. It was a length delivery slanted across the left-hander who stabs it low but straight to Ross Taylor. Gone!
length delivery outside off, holding its line, left alone
pushed away for a quick single.
on the pads, rolls away to the leg side and a easy run results
drifts down leg side, Gambhir can't connect with the flick and Pete does well to collect that
outside off stump, Gambhir comes forward, opens the bat face and glides the full delivery through the vacant slip region
from round the stumps, on the off and middle, defended to the off side. Vettori is busy wiping the ball dry after every ball
on the middle and leg, turned to short fine leg
rocks back to cut to deep backward point
quicker, fuller - as if he ever bowls short - outside off, left alone
lovely delivery, beaten all hands up. It sort of curled away and past the outside edge ...
slightly short in length, cut away to sweeper cover
full in length, lands just outside leg, moves in to hit the pad. They pick up a leg bye
shapes in again, Dhoni goes for the drive but is surprised by the movement and edges it to the on side
gentle-seam up stuff, overpitched outside off stump and Dhoni drives through covers for four runs.
full toss, squirted past square leg. That must have been border line no-ball call.
length delivery outside off, bit more effort at the release and it bounces to beat Dhoni's intended flash.  The drizzle is getting heavier.
short in length and outside off stump, dabbed to point
short-pitched delivery outside off and Dhoni hops to cut it past point
length delivery outside off stump, pushed to the off side
Gambhir clears the front foot and the bowler takes it full and outside off. And Gambhir can't connect with his slog
fullish delivery, almost yorker length, dug out by Gautam
another yorker, super delivery, Dhoni brings down his bat in a hurry to keep it out.
full pitched on the off and middle line, driven to long-on. O'Brien dries the ball with a towel as he walks back to his mark
It was full and straight. Gambhir moved to the legside and went for the big slog but the ball ballooned for the sweeper cover to come running in and take it.
low full toss outside off stump, attempted yorker gone awry, and Dhoni scoops it over mid-off for a easy boundary
another low dipping full toss and Dhoni drills it past the bowler for couple of runs.
length delivery this time and Dhoni lunges forward to push it through mid-on for a single
short in length, on the hips, tucked to fine leg
yorker length but outside off stump and that allows Raina to dig it out towards backward point for a single
full, not yorker length but Dhoni can't put it away. It was drifting to his pads and he tried to get it past the short fine-leg fielder but missed and was hit on the pad
again full, again on the pad, again Dhoni misses out. This time he tried to swing it to midwicket but didn't connect well
a short delivery and Raina went for the pull. I thought he skied it straight up but it went straight over the bowler's head and one bounce and over the ropes.
length delivery this time, Raina goes for another big pull but misses. Rain getting heavier.
fuller length, almost at the blockhole, squeezed to the on side for a run
Another successful swing. Again didn't go where he intended. He wanted to ping cowcorner, it flew off the inner edge to deep square leg
pushed away for a single
full toss but Dhoni swings it straight to deep midwicket. The bowlers are unable to grip the ball properly
slower one, full and yorker length, Raina moves outside leg, lunges to keep it out, towards backward point
